column5: Fall is definatly my favourite time of year.  This year has been no exception. Hit the river bank about a dozen or so times now with the company of some friends. Anyways not much for story telling but heres a few pics.  Salmon were slim pickings still this year but still managed a few.     Trolling flatfish have taken a few bows.   My favourite has been sitting in the fold out chair still fishing a deep pool. Not many big fish but lots of little guys with crazy air shows. Definatly some good spawning went on and good survival a few years ago.              Up to the french bright an early tomorrow for the deer hunt to put the icing on the cake.
a picture is worth 1000 words.Nice job
Great stuff fella !!! Next time take the old man with ya eh ! lol
I guess it has been about two years since I've seen him on the bank. LOL Maybe one nice day here i can drag him down.
Great report and pics 12footspringbok Good luck with the deer hunt Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice! Looks like you had a great time. Good luck on the hunt!
Nice clean looking trout.I think when river fishing the smaller ones are the better scrapers. The big ones just run and run and run.lol
Yea,if only he would leave them darn perch alone.  Nice pics and fish.
